subject: Mathematics
description: Mathematics is the study of numbers, shapes, and patterns. It includes topics like algebra, geometry, and calculus.

subject: Physics
description: Physics explores the fundamental nature of the universe, including motion, energy, force, and matter.

subject: Chemistry
description: Chemistry focuses on the composition, properties, and reactions of substances and materials.

subject: Biology
description: Biology is the study of living organisms, covering topics like genetics, evolution, and cellular processes.

subject: History
description: History examines past events, societies, and civilizations to understand how they shape the present and future.
